radiographic_examinations.findings: Barrett esophagus with a single mildly dysplastic gland
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Subsequent endoscopy in 2002 showed Barrett esophagus without evidence of dysplasia

radiographic_examinations.findings: Barrett esophagus without evidence of dysplasia
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: The length of Barrett esophagus has not been specified in the reports.
